about.intro:
Born and raised in Osaka, now living in Tokyo.
Studied information science and NLP at university.
Experienced in web app, backend, frontend, and batch processing.
Interested in NLP since student days, now developing a language learning app using YouTube subtitles and generative AI.

ytgenai.catch: A multilingual learning web app using YouTube subtitles and generative AI
ytgenai.desc: Focusing on the affinity and linguistic similarity between Japanese and Korean subtitles, developing a language learning site where fans can share and accumulate learning data and explanations through otaku content.

stackReason.backend: Reason: Used Python for YouTube subtitle analysis tools at university, and Python has abundant resources for YouTube integration.
stackReason.frontend: Reason: Chose Vue.js for personal development to learn it, as I had no professional experience with it.
